screen.name: ChoiceBox
screen.title: Input
screen.applet:
# this should be factored out into some helper code, but currently demonstrates applets. from enigma import eSize, ePoint
orgwidth = self.instance.size().width() orgpos = self.instance.position() textsize = self["text"].getSize()
# y size still must be fixed in font stuff... textsize = (textsize[0] + 220, textsize[1] + 80) count = len(self.list) if count > 10: count = 10 offset = 32 * count wsizex = textsize[0] + 80 wsizey = textsize[1] + offset + 20
if (720 > wsizex): wsizex = 720 wsize = (wsizex, wsizey)
# resize self.instance.resize(eSize(*wsize))
# resize label self["text"].instance.resize(eSize(*textsize))
# move list listsize = (wsizex - 20, 32 * count) self["list"].instance.move(ePoint(10, textsize[1])) self["list"].instance.resize(eSize(*listsize))
# center window newwidth = wsize[0] self.instance.move(ePoint((1280-wsizex)/2, (720-wsizey)/(count > 7 and 2 or 3)))

P L A Y L I S T

screen.name: MessageBox
screen.title: Message
screen.applet:
# this should be factored out into some helper code, but currently demonstrates applets. from enigma import eSize, ePoint orgwidth = self.instance.size().width() orgpos = self.instance.position() textsize = self["text"].getSize()
# y size still must be fixed in font stuff... textsize = (textsize[0] + 80, textsize[1] + 80) offset = 20 if self.type == self.TYPE_YESNO: offset = 80 wsizex = textsize[0] + 120 wsizey = textsize[1] + offset if (800 > wsizex): wsizex = 800 wsize = (wsizex, wsizey)
# resize self.instance.resize(eSize(*wsize))
# resize label self["text"].instance.resize(eSize(*textsize))
# move list listsize = (wsizex - 20, 80) self["list"].instance.move(ePoint(120, textsize[1])) self["list"].instance.resize(eSize(*listsize))
# center window newwidth = wsize[0] self.instance.move(ePoint(orgpos.x() + (orgwidth - newwidth)/2, orgpos.y()))

screen.name: MessageBoxSimple
screen.title: Message
screen.applet:
# this should be factored out into some helper code, but currently demonstrates applets. from enigma import eSize, ePoint
orgwidth = self.instance.size().width() orgheight = self.instance.size().height() orgpos = self.instance.position() textsize = self["text"].getSize() lenlist = len(self.list)*25 if (lenlist > 125): lenlist = 125
# y size still must be fixed in font stuff... textsize = (textsize[0] + 50, textsize[1] + 50) offset = 0 if self.type == self.TYPE_YESNO: offset = lenlist+10 wsizex = textsize[0] + 60 wsizey = textsize[1] + offset if (280 > wsizex): wsizex = 280 wsize = (wsizex, wsizey)
# resize self.instance.resize(eSize(*wsize))
# resize label self["text"].instance.resize(eSize(*textsize))
# move list listsize = (wsizex, lenlist) self["list"].instance.move(ePoint(0, textsize[1])) self["list"].instance.resize(eSize(*listsize))
# center window newwidth = wsize[0] self.instance.move(ePoint(orgpos.x() + (orgwidth - newwidth)/2, orgpos.y() + (orgheight - wsizey)/2))

{"templates": {"default": (25, [ MultiContentEntryText(pos = (0, 2), size = (38, 25), font = 0, flags = RT_HALIGN_LEFT, text = 1), # key, MultiContentEntryText(pos = (10, 2), size = (40, 25), font = 0, flags = RT_HALIGN_LEFT, text = 2), # number, MultiContentEntryText(pos = (60, 2), size = (110, 25), font = 0, flags = RT_HALIGN_LEFT, text = 3, color = 0x00989797, color_sel = 0x00000000), # description, MultiContentEntryText(pos = (180, 0), size = (320, 25), font = 1, flags = RT_HALIGN_LEFT, text = 4, color = 0x00f7ba00, color_sel = 0x00000000), # language, MultiContentEntryText(pos = (560, 0), size = (20, 25), font = 1, flags = RT_HALIGN_RIGHT, text = 5), # selection, ], True, "showOnDemand"), "notselected": (25, [ MultiContentEntryText(pos = (0, 2), size = (38, 25), font = 0, flags = RT_HALIGN_LEFT, text = 1), # key, MultiContentEntryText(pos = (10, 2), size = (40, 25), font = 0, flags = RT_HALIGN_LEFT, text = 2), # number, MultiContentEntryText(pos = (60, 2), size = (110, 25), font = 0, flags = RT_HALIGN_LEFT, text = 3, color = 0x00989797, color_sel = 0x00000000), # description, MultiContentEntryText(pos = (180, 0), size = (320, 25), font = 1, flags = RT_HALIGN_LEFT, text = 4, color = 0x00f7ba00, color_sel = 0x00000000), # language, MultiContentEntryText(pos = (560, 0), size = (20, 25), font = 1, flags = RT_HALIGN_RIGHT, text = 5), # selection, ], False, "showOnDemand") }, "fonts": [gFont("hdi", 19), gFont("Regular", 21)], "itemHeight": 30 }
